author: kpedro88
body:
After #14856, the HcalCholeskyMatrix objects are no longer used. This PR removes all the CMSSW access for these classes, based on the discussion in #14954.

Not altered in this PR:
CondFormats/HcalObjects
CondCore/Utilities

attn: @abdoulline
title: remove access to HcalCholeskyMatrix
